title: Part C
stimulusHtml:

One point is earned for the answer

Using integration by parts,

∫ xf(x)dx= ∫ x 2 e − x 2 dx=− 1 2 x e − x 2 + 1 2 ∫ e − x 2 dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWdba qaaiaadIhacaWGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaamizaiaadIhacqGH 9aqpdaWdbaqaaiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaabeqab0Gaey 4kIipaaSqabeqaniabgUIiYdGccaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsisl caWG4bWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaakiaadsgacaWG4bGaeyypa0 JaeyOeI0YaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGOmaaaacaWG4bGaamyzamaa CaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaamiEamaaCaaameqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccq GHRaWkdaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaamaapeaabaGaamyzamaa CaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaamiEamaaCaaameqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGcca WGKbGaamiEaaWcbeqab0Gaey4kIipaaOqaaaaaaa@5B92@

∫ 0 ∞ xf(x)dx= lim b→∞ [ − 1 2 x e − x 2 | 0 b + 1 2 ∫ e − x 2 dx ] = lim b→∞   (- 1 2 b e − b 2 )+ 1 2 ∫ 0 8 e − x 2 dx =0+ 1 2 . π 2 = π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWdXa qaaiaadIhacaWGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaamizaiaadIhacqGH 9aqpdaWfqaqaaiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcbaGaamOyaiabgkziUk abg6HiLcqabaaabaGaaGimaaqaaiabg6HiLcqdcqGHRiI8aOWaamWa aeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadIhacaWGLb WaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaWG4bWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaa kiaacYhadaWgaaWcbaGaaGimaaqabaGcdaahaaWcbeqaaiaadkgaaa GccqGHRaWkdaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaamaapeaabaGaamyz amaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaamiEamaaCaaameqabaGaaGOmaaaaaa GccaWGKbGaamiEaaWcbeqab0Gaey4kIipaaOGaay5waiaaw2faaaqa aiabg2da9maaxababaGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaaleaacaWGIbGaey OKH4QaeyOhIukabeaakiaabccacaqGGaGaaeikaiaab2cadaWcaaqa aiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadkgacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsi slcaWGIbWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaakiaacMcacqGHRaWkdaWc aaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaamaapehabaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqaba GaeyOeI0IaamiEamaaCaaameqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccaWGKbGaamiE aaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaiIdaa0Gaey4kIipaaOqaaiabg2da9iaaic dacqGHRaWkdaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaac6cadaWcaaqa amaakaaabaGaeqiWdahaleqaaaGcbaGaaGOmaaaacqGH9aqpdaWcaa qaamaakaaabaGaeqiWdahaleqaaaGcbaGaaGinaaaaaaaa@88E3@
